ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask

Class LoadingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.LoadingView

  • public class LoadingView
extends java.lang.Object
    A loading screen that can be used to briefly hide the interface and prevent the user from acting when there are other commands pending.
    Author:
    Michael Feist
